example.name: passive
example.text: But Robert Gabele , president of Invest\/Net , a North Miami , Fla. , company that [*T*-6] packages and sells the insider-trading data , said [0][the proposal]-4 is worded [*-4] so vaguely that key officials may fail [*-1] to file the reports .

example.text: Based on the wording in the endoscopy report
